definitions.text: floor consisting of a large unpartitioned space over a factory or warehouse or other commercial space
floor consisting of open space at the top of a house just below roof; often used for storage
(golf) the backward slant on the head of some golf clubs that is designed to drive the ball high in the air
a raised shelter in which pigeons are kept

examples: The rocket lofted the space shuttle into the air

definitions.text: kick or strike high in the air
lay out a full-scale working drawing of the lines of a vessel's hull
